values: 潜在的；可能的；有潜力的；有能力的；有前途的；有希望的；预期的；未来可能成为现实的
潜力；潜能；可能性；潜在性；电势；电压；电位；势能；位能；潜质

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表形容词, "...的", 一般缀于名词后

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指存在但看不见的现象或潜在的性质。
强调潜在的可能性或能力。

word_group.brief_definition: 潜在威胁；潜在危险；潜在的压力
静息电位；静态电位；休止电位
充分潜力；全部潜力；全部潜能
潜在风险；可能风险；隐患
潜在客户；潜质客户；可能顾客

bilingual.target: 我们需要识别出潜在的风险。
这个奖项有很多潜在的接受者。
我们必须淘汰所有潜在的风险。

bilingual.source: We need to guard against potential dangers.
bilingual.target: 我们需要防备潜在的危险。

bilingual.source: We must assess all potential operating risks.
bilingual.target: 我们必须评估所有潜在的经营风险。

bilingual.source: I met many potential employers at the job fair.
bilingual.target: 我在招聘会上遇到了很多潜在的雇主。

bilingual.source: The alarm system prevented a potential burglary.
bilingual.target: 警报系统阻止了一起潜在的入室盗窃。

bilingual.source: Her screaming scare away the potential intruder.
bilingual.target: 她的尖叫声吓跑了潜在的入侵者。

bilingual.source: The antique shop is full of potential trouvaille.
bilingual.target: 那家古董店里充满了潜在的意外的发现。

bilingual.source: Investors are excited about the potential buyout.
bilingual.target: 投资者对潜在的收购感到兴奋。

yingyinNormal.en: They would like us to consider the possibility, okay, of, meeting with some, potential CEOs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们希望我们能考虑，恩，见见潜在的首席执行官的可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: We've all been responding in real time to a potential terrorist attack. But you chose to stay here. Why weren't you in the bunker with us?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都在实时应对一起潜在的恐怖袭击。但你选择待在这里。你怎么不和我们一起在地堡里？

yingyinNormal.en: This drug has the potential to save lives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这药能救人性命。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Almost finished with the potential disasters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 潜在灾难的列表差不多完成啦。

yingyinNormal.en: It has the potential to be absolute hell, doesn't it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 完全有可能是地狱般的经历，不是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Ordinary, yet I sense it is dripping with magical potential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看似普通，不过我感觉到它隐隐散发的魔力了。

yingyinNormal.en: We are willing to continue discussions on a potential compromise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们愿意继续谈判基于一个有可能性的妥协的基础上

yingyinNormal.en: So, why didn't you go? You know what I see when I look at you? Don't say Potential. Potential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你为什么没去？你知道当我看着你时我看到了什么吗？别说是潜力。潜力。

yingyinNormal.en: I've always felt like I wasn't eating up to my full potential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直认为我吃东西的潜力还没全部挖掘出来。

yingyinNormal.en: Your son has so much potential. His safe requires deadly weapons.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的儿子有无穷的潜力。他的周全需要更有效的武器。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't care if HP didn't like it. It matters. Yeah. It's got potential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不在意惠普喜不喜欢欢它.但它是个好东西，耶，它是有潜力的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the Tesseract. It has the potential energy to wipe out the planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个叫做宇宙魔方，这东西有着摧毁地球的能量。

yingyinNormal.en: Classes will dull your mind. Destroy the potential for authentic creativity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上课会使你大脑变迟钝。消灭富有重大创造性的潜能。

yingyinNormal.en: And the lack of equal opportunity keeps all of us from failing our true potential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 缺乏平等机会让我们所有人无法发挥自己的真正潜能。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: I have always believed technology would help us fulfill our potential as a species.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直相信，科技可以帮助我们开拓作为人类的潜力。

yingyinNormal.en: No, the Sex Pistols have potential. This is the wheel. It's the industrial revolution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，性手枪（乐队）才被说成是有潜力的东西，这是个轮子会引发一场工业革命的轮子。

yingyinNormal.en: Doctor, we're facing a potential global catastrophe. Well, those I actively try to avoid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 博士，我们现在面临一场全球性的灾难。我倒是一直都想远离灾难呢。

yingyinNormal.en: And your parents are comfortable with your limited earning potential? Oh, yes. Not at all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们父母对你们那点可怜收入也无所谓吗？哦，是的。完全不。

yingyinNormal.en: You will be pooling from 60 fortune companies. You will mainly be cold-calling potential clients.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们将共同使用这60家公司，你们主要负责打电话给这些随机选择的潜在客户。

yingyinNormal.en: One. That's a bit of a long shot, isn't it? One system with three potential worlds? No long shot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就一个，不觉得风险有点大吗？一个星系，要是有三个可能的地方，已经不错了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 潜力; 潜能; 可能性
[物理]电势; 电位; 电压

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: having or showing the capacity to become or develop into something in the future

examination_example.sentence: Eliminate their <highlight>potential</highlight> competitors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 淘汰他们潜在的竞争对手。

examination_example.sentence: Forests may become a <highlight>potential</highlight> threat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 森林可能成为潜在的威胁。

examination_example.sentence: Newly published discovery claims and credible discoveries will always be open to challenge and <highlight>potential</highlight> modification or refutation by future researchers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新发表的声明和可信的发现将总是受到未来研究人员的挑战或可能的修改或反驳。

sense_info_list.en: latent qualities or abilities that may be developed and lead to future success or usefulness
sense_info_list.zh: 潜力; 潜能; 可能性

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>potential</highlight> of this work applied to healthcare is very great.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项工作应用于医疗保健的潜力非常大。

examination_example.sentence: Many jobs are boring, degrading, unhealthy, and a waste of human <highlight>potential</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多工作都很无聊，很丢脸，不健康，并且浪费人的潜能。

examination_example.sentence: Similar to newly staked mining claims, they are full of <highlight>potential</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这与新近开发的采矿资源比较类似，它们充满了潜力。

sense_info_list.en: the difference in voltage between two points in an electric field or circuit
sense_info_list.zh: [物理]电势; 电位; 电压

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 能明显发现的积极因素，一般用于褒义。
指未用语言或行动表达，但可以通过某种迹象推断出来的事物。
表示以前是明显的，现在由于意外或思想活动而隐藏，含有存在的不活跃或不明显的意思。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 潜在的; 有希望的; 潜力

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 威力；影响；性交能力；潜力；药效；潜能；发育能力

sense_info_list.en: expected to become or be; in prospect
sense_info_list.zh: 潜在的; 有希望的; 潜力

examination_example.sentence: They argued that her causal-sounding claims rested on correlational data, and that she had not adequately accounted for other <highlight>potential</highlight> causal factors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为，她的因果关系主张基于相关数据，并且她没有充分说明其他潜在的因果关系的原因。

examination_example.sentence: That institute examined a wider range of <highlight>potential</highlight> problems for humanity, while the LCFI has a narrow focus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该研究所研究了范围更广的人类潜在问题，而LCFI关注的范围很窄。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>potential</highlight> benefits of creating intelligence are huge. We cannot predict what we might achieve when our own minds are amplified by AI.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创造智能的潜在好处是巨大的。我们无法预测当人工智能扩大了我们的思维时我们将会实现什么。

sense_info_list.en: existing in possibility; capable of development into actuality

examination_example.sentence: Researchers will identify how different experiences, behaviors and environments relate to each other, with the <highlight>potential</highlight> to improve people's productivity and wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员将确定不同的经历、行为和环境如何相互联系，从而有可能提高人们的生产力和福祉。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 潜在的; 有希望的; 潜力

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: expected to become or be; in prospect
sense_info_list.zh: 潜在的; 有希望的; 潜力

examination_example.sentence: Most of them engage with <highlight>potential</highlight> donors, since projects that answered questions from interested donors fared better. And they target a small amount of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中的大多数都与潜在捐助者进行接触，因为回答感兴趣的捐助者问题的项目进展得更好。并且他们的目标金额不多。

examination_example.sentence: These studies showed that their water did contain microplastics, but far less than the Orb study suggested Regardless, the World Health Organization has launched a review into the <highlight>potential</highlight> health risks of drinking water from plastic bottles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些研究表明，他们的水里确实含有微塑料，但远远低于Orb机构测出的含量数据。但是不管怎样，世界卫生组织已经对塑料瓶饮用水的潜在健康风险展开了一项审查。

examination_example.sentence: The nutritional and health crises that followed the policy of structural adjustment, he says, led to many children and teenagers failing to reach their full <highlight>potential</highlight> in terms of height.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，结构调整政策之后的营养和健康危机，导致许多儿童和青少年在身高方面未能充分发挥潜力。

examination_example.sentence: A new technology has the <highlight>potential</highlight> to change modern society in radical ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新技术有可能以激进的方式改变现代社会。

examination_example.sentence: It is necessary for the companies and state agencies involved to consider the ethical consequences of these <highlight>potential</highlight> changes to build a better future for all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有关公司和国家机构有必要考虑这些潜在变化的道德后果，为所有人建设一个更美好的未来。

sense_info_list.en: existing in possibility; capable of development into actuality

examination_example.sentence: Even if people are able to economically support a retirement at 65, over thirty years of <highlight>potential</highlight> inactivity is harmful to cognitive (认知的) and emotional vitality. Many people may simply not want to do it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使人们有经济能力负担的起65岁之后的退休生活，接下来30多年不工作也会损害他们的认知和情感活力。许多人可能根本不愿如此。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>potential</highlight> for safer cars means accident statistics would drop: some 94% of road accidents in the U.S. involve human error.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汽车更安全的可能意味着事故的统计数字将下降：在美国，约94%的道路事故涉及人为错误。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表形容词, "...的", 一般缀于名词后

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: existing in possibility; capable of development into actuality

examination_example.sentence: While a cheater might use it to control <highlight>potential</highlight> victims.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而骗子可能会利用这种能力来控制潜在的受害者。

examination_example.sentence: That way, you will avoid <highlight>potential</highlight> time delays in getting to your classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样，你就可以避免上课时可能出现的时间延误。

examination_example.sentence: One's <highlight>potential</highlight> cannot always be underrated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个人的潜力不能总是被低估。

examination_example.sentence: Artist Anneke Camstra is engaged in the pursuit of lifelong learning and displays her <highlight>potential</highlight> for teaching.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术家Anneke Camstra致力于追求终身学习，并展示了她的教学潜力。
